sect2.title: S/390 and zSeries machine types
sect2.para:
Since &debian; Squeeze, support for booting in ESA/390 mode was dropped. Your machine needs to support for at least the z/Architecture, Architecture Level Set 2. The userland is still compiled for ESA/390, though. All zSeries hardware is fully supported.
&arch-title; support software is included from the kernel 2.6.39 development stream. The most current information about IBM's Linux support can be found at the
Linux on System z page on developerWorks.
